summary: This module defines a test suite that verifies the functionality of the RetinaNet object detection model within the MONAI framework. It checks output shapes, integration with both a naive backbone and a ResNetâ€‘50 FPN backbone, anchor generation, evaluation mode handling, and the ability to serialize and run the detection script.
business_intent: Provide automated validation to guarantee that RetinaNet detectors work correctly for medical imaging applications, facilitating reliable model development, regression testing, and deployment readiness.
